creator: Pelipost Technologies LLC
descriptionHtml:
Do you have an incarcerated loved one? Pelipost makes it easier than ever to stay connected. Share your special moments by sending beautiful, full-color 4x6 photos directly from your smartphone. Pelipost ships directly to your loved one in any city, state, or federal correctional facility in the USA. FAST, FREE SHIPPING  on every order!

NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO HIDDEN FEES, NO GIMMICKS. 
 
SAVE TIME, SAVE MONEY, STAY CONNECTED.
-No more trips to the store for photo prints.
-No more trips to the post office for postage.
-Earn rewards for every $1 spent with our PeliPOINTS Loyalty Program.
 
Take the guesswork out of sending pictures: The Pelipost app will tell you the photo RULES & REGULATIONS for each facility to ensure your order isn't returned by correctional staff.
 
HOW IT WORKS
 
+ Upload your digital photos from your gallery, Facebook, and Instagram to the Pelipost app.
+ Input your loved one's INMATE NUMBER and MAILING ADDRESS.
+ We print and ship DIRECTLY to your loved one's facility, arriving about 3-5 BUSINESS days. Always with FREE SHIPPING.
 
All photos sent are beautiful, full-color 4x6 prints, professionally processed by our experienced customer service team.
 
Just SMILE, SNAP, AND SEND with PELIPOST. It's that easy!
 
Questions about our service? Issue with your order?
 
Our award-winning Customer Support Team is standing by to help you resolve your issue. Send us a message at support@pelipost.com.. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority!

title: Pelipost - The Photos-to-Prison App

creator: Pelipost Technologies LLC
descriptionHtml:
Do you have an incarcerated loved one? Pelipost makes it easier than ever to stay connected. Share your special moments by sending beautiful, full-color 4x6 photos from your smartphone. Pelipost ships directly to your loved one in any city, state, or federal correctional facility in the USA.

We've shipped over 10 MILLION photos and counting!


How does it work?

- Upload your digital photos from your gallery, Facebook, and Instagram to the Pelipost app.
- Input your loved one's mailing address and click SEND.
- We print and ship DIRECTLY to your loved one's facility, arriving in about 3-5 BUSINESS days. Always with FREE SHIPPING.

All photos sent are beautiful full-color 4x6 prints, professionally processed by our experienced customer service team.

NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO HIDDEN FEES, NO GIMMICKS.

SAVE TIME, SAVE MONEY, STAY CONNECTED.
- No more trips to the store for photo prints.
- No more trips to the post office for postage.
- Earn rewards for every $1 spent with our PeliPOINTS Loyalty Program.

Take the guesswork out of sending pictures. The Pelipost app will tell you the photo RULES & REGULATIONS for each facility to ensure your order isn't returned by correctional staff.

Just SMILE, SNAP, AND SEND with PELIPOST. It's that easy!

Don't take our word for it. See what some of our customers are saying about Pelipost:

R. Valenzuela
"Great service! My loved one receives every picture I send them and it is soooo easy!!! Thank you Pelipost, you helped me and my loved one have better and brighter days.”

L. Vargas
"Very happy with this app. Was a little unsure at first so I emailed the company and they were very helpful. Answered my questions. Tried it last week. Sent photos to my husband in Corcoran who got them a few days later. Will use again and again. THANK YOU!"

J. Kingsley
"I love this app. Makes it easy to send private pictures without awkward face-to-face pickups in stores. It takes care of everything — printing and mailing. You just choose the pictures. You can also edit, add text, stickers, draw on the pictures, add filters, etc before sending."

Questions about our service? Issue with your order?

Our award-winning Customer Support Team is standing by to help you resolve your issue. Send us a message at support@pelipost.com. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority!

Send photos to any inmate, any facility, DIRECTLY from your smartphone.



"Pelipost", "The Photos-to-Prison App", and our logo are all registered trademarks with the USPTO. All rights reserved.
descriptionShort: Send photos to any inmate, any facility, DIRECTLY from your smartphone.

title: Pelipost - Photos-to-Prison

creator: Pelipost Technologies LLC
descriptionHtml:
Sending pictures to an incarcerated loved one takes time and effort, which is why this mother-son duo created Pelipost: The Photos-to-Prison App®. This easy to use mobile app allows you to send pictures with a click of a button – Pelipost does the rest.

We understand the importance of receiving mail while incarcerated, and we know what a hassle it can be to send it. When you’re in prison, a picture is worth more than a thousand words. It’s a lifeline to the outside — offering hope, connection, and tenderness in a place that doesn’t embody those qualities.

Now you can send high-quality photo prints directly from the Pelipost app on any smart device.

No contracts, hidden fees, gimmicks, or hassles EVER!

OVER 10 MILLION PHOTOS SHIPPED, 4,000+ facilities served, and 500,000 users and counting!


How It Works

Upload your favorite photos directly from your phone. All images are printed in-house, so they stay private until shipped. Upload from your camera reel, Instagram, or Facebook.

We print and ship for you DIRECTLY to your loved one’s correctional facility. Take the effort out of staying connected. Using state-of-the-art printers, we ship your order FOR FREE via USPS. Applies to U.S orders only.

Photos reach your loved one. Your order will arrive at the intended correctional facility within 3-5 business days with free, fast shipping — quicker than leading competitors.

The purpose of this app is to make it as fluid as possible to get photographs of those who are incarcerated in state and federal facilities.

When you order from Pelipost, you get:
FREE shipping on every order.
Peace of mind that your photos will arrive quickly.
High-quality photo prints that your loved one will cherish.
Privacy since we print all pictures in-house.
Reliable customer service and resources to help you.

Pelipost is here for you and your loved one during this time!

When you send photos with Pelipost, you automatically start earning PeliPOINTS towards FREE prints and neat swag.

SAVE TIME. SAVE MONEY. STAY CONNECTED.

See what customers have to say about using Pelipost:

"Great service! My loved one receives every picture I send them and it is soooo easy!!! Thank you pelipost seriously you helped me and my loved one have better and brighter days…" — R. Valenzuela

"Very happy with this app. Was a little unsure at first so I emailed the company and they were very helpful. Answered my questions. Tried it last week. Sent photos to my husband in Corcoran who got them a few days later. Will use again and again. THANK YOU!" — L. Vargas

"I love this app. Makes it easy to send private pictures without awkward face-to-face pickups in stores. It takes care of everything - printing and mailing. You just choose the pictures. You can also edit, add text, stickers, draw on the pictures, add filters, etc before sending." — J. Kingsley

About Pelipost:

Pelipost was born out of personal experience and compassion for what families are going through during a period of incarceration. The founders of this company, Becky and Joe, experienced first-hand what it was like to navigate trying to stay connected and missing out on major milestones while one was incarcerated.

It was from their struggle that Pelipost came to be.

Download the Photos-to-Prison App® today, start connecting with your loved ones, and experience the fastest, most reliable photo-sharing service in the industry.

If you have questions about our service or issues with your order, contact our award-winning Customer Support Team. You can message us at support@pelipost.com, and we’re happy to answer any questions you may have.
descriptionShort: Send photos to any inmate, any facility, DIRECTLY from your smartphone.

title:
Pelipost: Photos-to-Prison
13.6.1

creator: Pelipost Technologies LLC
descriptionHtml:
Sending photos to inmates aka your incarcerated loved one takes time and effort, which is why this mother-son duo created Pelipost: The Photos-to-Prison App®. This easy to use smart jail mail photo service allows you to send photos to inmates with a click of a button – Pelipost does the rest.

We understand the importance of receiving smart jail mail while incarcerated, and we know what a hassle it can be to send it. When you’re in prison, a picture is worth more than a thousand words. It’s a lifeline to the outside — offering hope, connection, and tenderness in a place that doesn’t embody those qualities. Send pictures to inmates without any hassle using Pelipost, Photos-to-Prison App® on any smart device.

No contracts, hidden fees, gimmicks, or hassles EVER!

OVER 20 MILLION PHOTOS SHIPPED, 4,000+ facilities served, and 500,000 users and counting!

HOW IT WORKS

Upload your favorite photos directly from your phone. All images are printed in-house, so they stay private until shipped. Upload from your camera reel or Instagram.

We print and ship your pictures DIRECTLY to your loved one’s jail or prison. Take the effort out of staying connected. Using state-of-the-art printers, we ship your order fast via USPS. Your order will arrive at the jail or prison within 3-5 business days — quicker than leading competitors.

The mission of the Photos-to-Prison App® is to make it as easy as possible to send printed photos to inmates in local jails, state prisons and federal correctional facilities across the United States.

When you order from Pelipost, you get:
◙ Peace of mind that your inmate photos will arrive quickly.
◙ High-quality photo prints that your loved one will cherish.
◙ Privacy since we print all pictures in-house.
◙ Reliable customer service and resources to help you.

Pelipost is here for you and your loved one during this time!

When you send photos with Pelipost, you automatically start earning PeliPOINTS towards FREE prints.

SAVE TIME. SAVE MONEY. STAY CONNECTED

See what customers have to say about using Pelipost:

"Great service! My loved one receives every picture I send them and it is soooo easy!!! Thank you pelipost seriously you helped me and my loved one have better and brighter days…" — R. Valenzuela

"Very happy with this app. Was a little unsure at first so I emailed the company and they were very helpful. Answered my questions. Tried it last week. Sent photos to my husband in Corcoran who got them a few days later. Will use again and again. THANK YOU!" — L. Vargas

"I love this app. Makes it easy to send private pictures without awkward face-to-face pickups in stores. It takes care of everything - printing and mailing. You just choose the pictures. You can also edit, add text, stickers, draw on the pictures, add filters, etc before sending." — J. Kingsley

About Pelipost:

Pelipost was born out of personal experience and compassion for what families are going through during a period of incarceration. The founders of this company, Becky and Joe, experienced first-hand what it was like to navigate trying to stay connected and missing out on major milestones while one was incarcerated.

It was from their struggle that Pelipost came to be.

Download the Photos-to-Prison App® today, start connecting with your loved ones, and experience the fastest, most reliable photo-sharing service in the industry.

If you have questions about our service or issues with your order, contact our award-winning Customer Support Team. You can message us at support@pelipost.com, and we’re happy to answer any questions you may have.
